pages.text: Horizontal Row will build blocks away from the player based on the direction they are looking. This is useful for building bridges! $(br2)Toggle 'place on top' to see how it changes the placement. $(br2)This is also available on the exchanger, to exchange 'left and right' of the direction the player is looking.
